评论详情: These jeans fit good, feel good, and look good, but the legs are so long that I can not wear them without heels without walking on the legs. Kinda sucks, to not have that versatility.
These are pretty & true to size but a bit lighter weight than I expected. Nice for summer
I loved the embroidery, they fit well. My only concern is the zipper catches and buckles.
Looks good but way to small and very flimsy material.
Very true to size, so pretty
The design looked okay but the pants are thin asf
Perfect fit, slightly stretchy gives it a nice fitted look, soft, perfect length for a 3" heel, eye catching.  I received a lot of complements on them.

These jeans feel like they were made specifically for me, they fit so well. I did have to wait for a few weeks to get them, but it was worth it. Look at them! I might have to buy some more in different colors. Five out of five stars.

I like light weight materials living south humidity states.  Well made, get lots of compliments, fits well.  Do get 1 size up, does have mild shrinkage. I wear med. but did get large and fit perfect after wash and dry.  Do love these and will order again.

The look is great, but the size runs a little small. I personally didn’t mind that, as I’m still losing weight, so in the next month I will fit in them. One drawback is that the material is thinner than I would like and I’m an active person, guess I’ll find out how well they hold up next month. Just for going out, or party, they would do just fine.
These jeans are so comfy, true to size. Shipping took a minute but worth it.
They were too long.I m 5'4", and they don't come in a short length.nice material.beautiful embroidery .
Bought these for a 70's party - but absolutely love them! Great fit and fun!
